content.heading: <dialog> Tag
paragraphs: The <dialog> tag defines a dialog box or modal.
Example: <dialog open>This is an open dialog window</dialog>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Used for popup dialogs or subwindows.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported by Chrome 37.0, Edge 79.0, Firefox 98.0, Safari 15.4, Opera 24.0.
